pages.text: Chlorine is combined in a $(l:block/chemical_infuser)Chemical Infuser$(/l) along with $(l:gas/hydrogen)Hydrogen$(/l) to make $(l:gas/hydrogen_chloride)Hydrogen Chloride$(/l).
It is produced by putting brine in an $(l:block/electrolytic_separator)Electrolytic Separator$(/l), which also produces $(l:gas/sodium)Sodium$(/l)
